title: 2 Simple Ways to Use Stickers on Facebook Messenger

steps.title: Open the Messenger app.
steps.content: Open the Messenger app. This is the multi-colored chat bubble icon with a white lightning bolt inside. If you're not signed in, follow the on-screen instructions to sign in now. Facebook Messenger is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap a chat to open it.
steps.content: Tap a chat to open it. You'll see a list of all open chats with a friend or group of friends. [1] X Research source To start a new chat, click the square and pencil icon and enter a recipient. If you aren't on the Chats page, tap Chats at the bottom-left corner.

steps.title: Tap the Sticker & GIF icon.
steps.content: Tap the Sticker & GIF icon. This looks like a smiley face. You can find this on the right side of the text field. [2] X Research source If you don't see this option, tap the 4-dots icon (Android) or + icon (iOS) first. A new menu will open.

steps.title: Tap the Stickers icon.
steps.content: Tap the Stickers icon. This looks like a smiley face within a square with the bottom-right corner tucked in. You can find this above the search bar, between the star and GIF icons.

steps.title: Find a sticker.
steps.content: Find a sticker. Use the search bar to enter keywords for stickers, or scroll down to view stickers in your Messenger library. To add more stickers, do the following: Scroll down and tap Visit sticker store . Tap the Featured or All tab. Tap a sticker pack to view its contents. Tap Download free pack .

steps.title: Tap a sticker.
steps.content: Tap a sticker. This will send the sticker to the recipient. If you sent the wrong sticker, tap and hold the sticker. Tap Unsend , and then tap Unsend for everyone to delete it .

steps.title: Go to https://www.messenger.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.messenger.com/ in a web browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your Facebook login ID and password to do so now. [3] X Research source You can also use Messenger at https://www.facebook.com/ . Log into your account and click the Messenger icon in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Click a chat to open it.
steps.content: Click a chat to open it. You'll see a list of all open chats with a friend or group of friends . [4] X Research source To start a new chat, click the square and pencil icon and enter a recipient.

steps.title: Click the Sticker icon.
steps.content: Click the Sticker icon. This looks like a square with the bottom-right corner tucked in. You can find this between the Picture and GIF icons at the bottom of the chat window. [5] X Research source A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Find a sticker.
steps.content: Find a sticker. Use the search bar to find a specific theme, or click the suggested themes in the first tab. You can also view all available stickers within the categories at the top. Click the right-arrow to view more categories.

steps.title: Click a sticker.
steps.content: Click a sticker. This will send the sticker to the recipient. If you sent the wrong sticker, hover the cursor over the sticker and click â‹® . Click Remove and select Unsend for everyone . Click Remove . Keep in mind that this sticker may still show up if someone exports the messages .

steps.title: Add more stickers (optional).
steps.content: Add more stickers (optional). If you want more stickers, you can add more from the Sticker Store . Do the following: Click the Sticker icon. Click + at the top-right corner. View a sticker pack by clicking the eye icon. Click + within the sticker pack to add it to Messenger.
